title: NA Speaker condoles death of constable Mubashir
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 25 (APP):Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq Monday expressed deep sorrow and grief over the tragic loss of Police Constable Mubashir by the protesters.
“I stand in solidarity with the bereaved family in their time of grief,” said the Speaker.
He paid tribute to the professional services of Shaheed Constable Mubashir, highlighting his dedication.
“Constable Mubashir embraced martyrdom while fulfilling his professional responsibilities,” he said.
“His sacrifice will always be remembered,” the Speaker added.
He further noted that police officers have made unparalleled sacrifices to ensure the safety and security of the nation’s lives and property.
Ayaz Sadiq prayed for the elevation of Shaheed Constable Mubashir’s rank in the afterlife and patience for his grieving family.
